revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: In compliance with your request of the 26th ult., I herewith enclose a copy of the answer of Messrs. A. M. and M. E. Clark, to the bill of complaint in the case of E. S. Brown vs. Mark W. Delahoy, et al., which is taken from a copy of the same transmitted to this office by the District Attorney for Kansas, under cover of a letter dated the 7th ult. This is the only document containing a statement from those parties, touching the subject of your communication, which has been received here.
